name: github-projects-viewer
description: View Github Projects built with Vue.js 2
author: flashback2k14

scripts.copy:d: cp -rv build prod/build && cp -rv assets prod/assets
scripts.copy:f: cp index.html prod && cp style.css prod && cp manifest.json prod
scripts.prod: npm run build && mkdir prod && npm run copy:d && npm run copy:f
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run prod && cd prod && surge --domain https://github-project-viewer.surge.sh
